sentence: John Zwaanstra has been promoted to be Legislative Director for Rep. Debbie Lesko (R-Ariz.).

sentence: Arizona far-right Republican U.S. Congresswoman Debbie Lesko made the false claim on the floor of the House of Representatives: Crime is skyrocketing, fentanyl is killing Americans, and what is Biden's response?
author: David Badash
title: Right-wing website made up viral fake claim Republicans like Marco Rubio are now pushing: report

sentence: https://t.co/aUG6nnPheE — Senator Todd Young (@SenToddYoung) April 4, 2022 “Over TWO million illegal immigrants have crossed into our nation since President Biden took office,” wrote Rep. Debbie Lesko (R-AZ).

title: Republicans Warn of ‘Biggest Migration Crisis in U.S. History’ as Joe Biden Nixes Title 42
